qas.question: What other country does Portugal border?
What is the longest uninterrupted border within the European Union?
How long is the Portugal-Spain border?
What two autonomous regions have their own governments in Portugal?

context: Portugal (Portuguese: [puɾtuˈɣaɫ]), officially the Portuguese Republic (Portuguese: República Portuguesa), is a country on the <a3_0>Iberian Peninsula, in Southwestern Europe<a3_0/>. It is the westernmost country of mainland Europe, being bordered by the <a0_0>Atlantic Ocean<a0_0/> to the west and south and by <a1_0>Spain<a1_0/> to the north and east. The <a2_0>Portugal–Spain<a2_0/> border is <a4_0>1,214 km (754 mi)<a4_0/> long and considered the longest uninterrupted border within the European Union. The republic also includes the Atlantic archipelagos of the <a5_0>Azores and Madeira<a5_0/>, both autonomous regions with their own regional governments.
